reviewText: My family and I loved it.
Inspirational, rising from extreme tragedy and physical devastation, God can turn tragedy into triumph and victory.

The story is great, but this copy of the story is not the best.  I've heard a better rendition of the story, but I haven't been able to find it.  I'm thinking that I heard it on a Christian program, but it may not have been on a DVD.
If someone knows where i can find a better rendition of the story; I would love to own it.
Inspirational story of unbelievable courage. I think this story should be told to everyone, makes you gain perspective if you're feeling discouraged.
